sample_trajectories.answer: Found 1 vegan Italian recipe: Vegan Pasta Primavera (ID: 1) with 30 minute cooking time. This recipe uses pasta, vegetables, and olive oil.
Recipe ID 2 is Chicken Tikka Masala, an Indian cuisine dish with 45 minute cooking time. Ingredients include chicken, yogurt, and spices.
